active.name: Sora Ashworth
active.description: Guild archivist trainee with empathic object reading abilities. Petite, bookish, ash-brown hair, amber eyes with magical shimmer. Wears rumpled archivist robes and a charm bracelet of investigation trinkets.
active.appearance: Age: 19, Height: 155 cm, Slender build, Ash-brown hair, Amber eyes, Muted blue/grey robes, Satchels, Charm bracelet, Guild badge.
active.introducedIn: Chapter 1: The Ledger and the Lie

active.name: Kael Ironwood
active.description: Son of Marcus Ironwood, former miner, now Guild clerk. Loyal, reserved, and determined to uncover the truth about his father's death.

active.name: Elena
active.description: Guild clerk, Sora's friend and mentor. Resourceful, perceptive, and supportive.

active.name: Master Aldric
active.description: Head archivist of Glyphmere Guild. Gruff, wise, and trusted by Marcus Ironwood.

active.name: Marcus Ironwood
active.description: Kael's father, former miner and Guild member. His death is the central mystery.

active.name: Thomas Graystone
active.description: Guild member with hidden motives, suspected in Marcus's death.

locations.name: Glyphmere Guild
locations.description: Magical guild headquarters with multiple archive levels, bustling with adventurers and clerks.

locations.name: Westmere Ruins
locations.description: Mysterious archaeological site with potential hidden archive and artifact vault. Site of suppressed knowledge and recent goblin activity.

locations.name: Millbrook
locations.description: Mining town, home of the Ironwood family, site of Marcus's death and ongoing investigation.

locations.name: Millhaven
locations.description: Sora's home village, site of the initial vision and bridge scandal.

Hints of a hidden 'Westmere Covenant' and suppressed knowledge.

What is the purpose of the targeted artifact recovery?

Origin and meaning of the goblin population surge.

storySummary: Sora Ashworth, a young archivist with empathic abilities, uncovers a web of conspiracy and suppressed knowledge at the Glyphmere Guild. With Kael, Elena, and Master Aldric, she investigates the mysterious death of Marcus Ironwood, the surge in goblin activity, and the secrets hidden in the Westmere ruins. The discovery of a brass key and evidence of Guild corruption set the stage for a deeper exploration of truth and danger.

magicalOrganizations.name: Glyphmere Adventurer's Guild
magicalOrganizations.description: Central hub for adventurers, scholars, and magical research. Oversees contracts, artifact recovery, and regional security.

artifacts.name: Brass Key
artifacts.description: Ornate, arcane-marked key found in Marcus Ironwood's study. Believed to unlock a hidden archive or artifact vault in Westmere.

timeline: Sora's vision in Millhaven reveals corruption (Chapter 1)
Investigation into Marcus's death and Guild conspiracy (Chapters 4-6)
